title: It's the little things that count
creator_credit: Caravel Films and Bates Manufacturing Company
brief_description: A motivational film presenting the problem of the retail salesman in reaching the buyer and gaining their confidence. Develops a technique in combatting the price argument by taking into consideration factors other thatn price only. Shows problems of the retail merchant in getting salesmen to conserve and plan their time. Illustrates with a number of articlea what is meant by ‘showmanship in selling’. Though not intended, this film presents an amusing stereotype of a 1940’s American saleman.
